an3.63:3.10: gonako → goṇako (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed) | cittako → cittakā (bj); cittikā (sya-all) | kadalimigapavarapaccattharaṇaṃ → kādalimigapavarapaccattharaṇaṃ (bj); kādasimigapavarapaccattharaṇaṃ (sya-all)
an3.63:4.3: laddhā ca pana → laddhā ca (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); laddhāni ca (sya-all, km)
